    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Greater Deathly Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3490) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 35</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175)

**Prerequisites**
[Deathly Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3487)

</column>

---

Your undead secrets grow stronger still. You learn either the [_malignant sustenance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=432) or [_grasping grave_](/Spells.aspx?ID=512) focus spell. Your focus pool increases by 1 point.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time, you learn a different spell and your focus pool increases by 1 Focus Point.
name: Greater Deathly Secrets
